description: This file defines a React component 'ConnectorSelector' that provides a debounced dropdown overlay for connector search results, with keyboard navigation, positioning relative to the caret within a textarea, and accessibility features.

methods.name: useDebounced
methods.description: Custom React Hook for debouncing a value with a specified delay.

methods.name: computeCaretRect
methods.description: Calculates the screen coordinates of the caret position within a textarea element for positioning the overlay.
